scripts.start: concurrently "cd micro-app; npm run dev" "cd micro-ui; npm run dev"
scripts.start-nextjs-pages-dir: concurrently "cd micro; npm run dev" "cd micro-ui; npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd micro-app; npm run build" "cd micro-ui; npm run build"
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd micro-app; npm run start" "cd micro-ui; npm run start"
